com.braintreegateway
Class AddressGateway

java.lang.Object
  com.braintreegateway.AddressGateway

public class AddressGateway
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods to create, delete, find, and update Address objects. This class does not need to be instantiated directly. Instead, use BraintreeGateway.address() to get an instance of this class: 

 BraintreeGateway gateway = new BraintreeGateway(...);
 gateway.address().create(...)
